title: OIDC: callback URI invoked on error
body:
### Describe the bug

I've managed to get auth errors (most of the time due to improper configuration, such as misconfiguring the scopes or disallowed callback URI) which end up invoking my callback endpoint, which should not happen.

Example:

```
2021-11-23 17:54:08,655 ERROR [io.qua.ver.htt.run.QuarkusErrorHandler] (executor-thread-0) HTTP Request to /Login/oidcLoginSuccess?error=redirect_uri_mismatch&error_description=The+redirect_uri+MUST+match+the+registered+callback+URL+for+this+application.&error_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.github.com%2Fapps%2Fmanaging-oauth-apps%2Ftroubleshooting-authorization-request-errors%2F%23redirect-uri-mismatch&state=a6f7a6c2-b8af-4a67-9f9d-ca5bc882ee0e failed, error id: a5f251f5-479f-4da9-9192-507b1198a3ef-4: io.quarkus.arc.ArcUndeclaredThrowableException: Error invoking subclass method
```
